module DRcon.Version
versionStr :: String
programName :: String
versionInfo :: String
licenseText :: String

module DRcon.Paths
configName :: String
configDirPath :: IO String
configPath :: IO String
historyPath :: IO String

module DRcon.Prompt
data PromptVars
PromptVars :: String -> String -> String -> String -> String -> String -> String -> PromptVars
promptName :: PromptVars -> String
promptHost :: PromptVars -> String
promptPort :: PromptVars -> String
promptTime :: PromptVars -> String
promptTimeSeconds :: PromptVars -> String
promptDate :: PromptVars -> String
promptConnectMode :: PromptVars -> String
data Prompt
parsePrompt :: String -> Prompt
formatPrompt :: TokenRender -> Prompt -> String
renderPrompt :: PromptVars -> Prompt -> String
getPromptVars :: String -> RconConnection -> IO PromptVars
readPrompt :: String -> Either String String
defaultPrompt :: String
promptEnvName :: String
instance Show a => Show (FormaterToken a)
instance Read a => Read (FormaterToken a)
instance Eq a => Eq (FormaterToken a)
instance Ord a => Ord (FormaterToken a)
instance Show PromptVars
instance Read PromptVars
instance Eq PromptVars
instance Eq Prompt
instance Show Prompt

module DRcon.CommandArgs
data ProtocolOptions :: *
OnlyIPv4 :: ProtocolOptions
OnlyIPv6 :: ProtocolOptions
BothProtocols :: ProtocolOptions
data BaseArgs
BaseArgs :: String -> Maybe String -> Maybe RconMode -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Float -> Maybe DecodeType -> Maybe ProtocolOptions -> BaseArgs
confServerString :: BaseArgs -> String
confPassword :: BaseArgs -> Maybe String
confMode :: BaseArgs -> Maybe RconMode
confTimeDiff :: BaseArgs -> Maybe Int
confTimeout :: BaseArgs -> Maybe Float
confEncoding :: BaseArgs -> Maybe DecodeType
confProtoOptions :: BaseArgs -> Maybe ProtocolOptions
data CommandArgs
CommandArgs :: String -> BaseArgs -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe String -> CommandArgs
cliServerName :: CommandArgs -> String
cliBaseArgs :: CommandArgs -> BaseArgs
cliColor :: CommandArgs -> Maybe Bool
cliCommand :: CommandArgs -> Maybe String
parseRconMode :: String -> Either String RconMode
checkTimeout :: Float -> Either String Float
parseEncoding :: String -> Either String DecodeType
showEncoding :: DecodeType -> String
parseColorMode :: String -> ReadM (Maybe Bool)
argsParser :: Parser CommandArgs
maybeArgsParser :: Parser (Maybe CommandArgs)
instance Show BaseArgs
instance Read BaseArgs
instance Eq BaseArgs
instance Show CommandArgs
instance Read CommandArgs
instance Eq CommandArgs

module DRcon.ConfigFile
data DRconArgs
DRconArgs :: RconInfo -> String -> Float -> DecodeType -> String -> DRconArgs
connectInfo :: DRconArgs -> RconInfo
connectName :: DRconArgs -> String
drconTimeout :: DRconArgs -> Float
drconEncoding :: DRconArgs -> DecodeType
drconPrompt :: DRconArgs -> String
type UtilError = ErrorT String IO
rconConfigure :: String -> BaseArgs -> UtilError DRconArgs
instance Show DRconArgs
instance Read DRconArgs
instance Eq DRconArgs

module DRcon.EvalParser
data CommandErrorType
UnknownCommand :: Text -> CommandErrorType
WrongArgumentType :: Text -> Text -> CommandErrorType
CommandTakesNoArgumens :: Text -> Text -> CommandErrorType
OtherError :: Text -> CommandErrorType
data EvalVar
Mode :: EvalVar
TimeDiff :: EvalVar
Timeout :: EvalVar
Encoding :: EvalVar
Color :: EvalVar
PromptVar :: EvalVar
data VarValue
SetMode :: RconMode -> VarValue
SetTimeDiff :: Int -> VarValue
SetTimeout :: Float -> VarValue
SetEncoding :: DecodeType -> VarValue
SetColor :: Bool -> VarValue
SetPrompt :: String -> VarValue
data InputType
Empty :: InputType
Quit :: InputType
Help :: InputType
Version :: InputType
RepeatLast :: InputType
Login :: InputType
ListVars :: InputType
Show :: EvalVar -> InputType
Set :: VarValue -> InputType
History :: (Maybe Int) -> InputType
RconCommand :: Text -> InputType
type EvalCmd = Either CommandErrorType InputType
parseCommand :: String -> EvalCmd
internalAutoComplete :: Text -> Text -> [Text]
helpMessage :: Text
helpVars :: Text
showVar :: VarValue -> String
instance Eq CommandErrorType
instance Eq EvalVar
instance Ord EvalVar
instance Bounded EvalVar
instance Enum EvalVar
instance Eq VarValue
instance Show InputType
instance Eq InputType
instance Show VarValue
instance Show EvalVar
instance Show CommandErrorType
